ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var JsDom = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup;
var Document = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
var Element = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Element;
            
var document = JsDom.parse(src);
            
// è·å–åŒ…å«<li>å…ƒç´ çš„<div>å…ƒç´ 
var divs = document.select('ul.list > div');

// å°†divsè½¬æ¢ä¸ºæ•°ç»„ä»¥ä¾¿æ’åº
var divArray = [];
for (var i = 0; i < divs.size(); i++) {
    divArray.push(divs.get(i));
}

// æŒ‰ç…§data-idå±æ€§å¯¹divArrayè¿›è¡Œæ’åº
divArray.sort(function(a, b) {
    var pageA = parseInt(a.attr('data-id'), 10);
    var pageB = parseInt(b.attr('data-id'), 10);
    return pageA - pageB;
});

var list = [];
// éå†æ’åºåçš„divArray
for (var i = 0; i < divArray.length; i++) {
    var div = divArray[i];
    var dataId = div.attr('data-id');
    // è·å–å½“å‰divä¸‹çš„æ‰€æœ‰<li>å…ƒç´ 
    var lis = div.select('li');
    for (var j = 0; j < lis.size(); j++) {
        var li = lis.get(j);
        var a = li.select('a').first();
        if (a != null) {
            list.push({
                text: a.text(),
                id: dataId, // ä½¿ç”¨data-idå±æ€§
                url: a.attr('href')
            });
        }
    }
}

//java.log(JSON.stringify(list));
list;
</js>

<js>
 var arr=title;
 var srt=title.replace(/ /g,"");
 var sft=title.replace(/ç¬¬.*?ç« ./g,"ç¬¬.*?");
 var sfc=sft.replace(/$/g,".*?é¡µ");
 var sfn=sft.replace(/$/g,".*?ç»§ç»­é˜…è¯»ã€‚");
 var srf=title.replace(/ /g,"ã€€");
 var fdr=title.replace(/[0-9]+[\s|\u3000]/g,"");
 var dff=src.replace(new RegExp(arr,"g"),"");
 var dfc=dff.replace(new RegExp("\n.{1,7}"+fdr,"g"),"");
 result=dfc.replace(new RegExp(srf,"g"),"").replace(new RegExp(srt,"g"),"").replace(new RegExp(sfn,"g"),"").replace(new RegExp(sfc,"g"),"");
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
match=result.match(/d\(".+"[^"]+".+"\)/)
function d(a, b){
	b = java.md5Encode(b)
	iv = b.substring(0, 16)
	key = b.substring(16)
	Cipher=java.createSymmetricCrypto("AES/CBC/PKCS7Padding" ,key,iv)
	return Cipher.decryptStr(a)}
eval(match[0])
</js>

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
var JsDom = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup;
var Document = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
var Element = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Element;

var document = JsDom.parse(src);

function getText(selector, context) {
    var elements = context ? context.select(selector) : document.select(selector);
    return elements.size() > 0 ? elements.first().text() : "";
}

function getHref(selector, context) {
    var elements = context ? context.select(selector) : document.select(selector);
    return elements.size() > 0 ? elements.first().attr("href") : "";
}

function getSrc(selector, context) {
    var elements = context ? context.select(selector) : document.select(selector);
    return elements.size() > 0 ? elements.first().attr("src") : "";
}

function generateJsonList() {
    var jsonList = [];
    var uls = document.select(".mySearch ul").not(".pagination"); 

    uls.forEach(function(ul) {
        var prevDiv = ul.previousElementSibling(); 
        var imgSrc = prevDiv ? getSrc("img", prevDiv) : ""; 

        var item = {
            "img": imgSrc,
            "name": getText("li:eq(0) a.b", ul),
            "author": getText("li:eq(2)", ul),
            "wordcount": getText("li:eq(3)", ul),
            "lastchaptr": getText("li:eq(1) a", ul),
            "kind": getText("li:eq(4)", ul)+","+getText("li:eq(5)", ul),
            "url": getHref("li:eq(0) a.b", ul)
        };
        jsonList.push(item);
    });

    return jsonList;
}

result = generateJsonList();
String(java.log(JSON.stringify(result)));


</js>
$[*]

var JsDom = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup;
var Document = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
var Element = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Element;


var document = JsDom.parse(src);

//è·å–åˆ—è¡¨
var links = document.select('.chap_tit > p > a');

var list = [];
for (var i = 0; i < links.size(); i++) {
    var link = links.get(i);
    list.push({
        text: link.text(),
        url: link.attr('href')
    });
}

//æ’åº
list.sort(function(a, b) {
    var pageA = parseInt(a.text.match(/\d+/)[0], 10);
    var pageB = parseInt(b.text.match(/\d+/)[0], 10);
    return pageA - pageB;
});


java.log(JSON.stringify(list));
list;
</js>

  }
})()

<js>
name = java.getString("h1@text")
author = java.getString("class.module-info-item-content.0@a@text") 
kind = java.getString("class.module-info-tag@text").replace("\/",",") 
lastchapter = java.getString("class.module-info-item-content.3@text").replace("æ›´æ–°è‡³","") 
i = java.getString("class.module-info-introduction-content@text").replace("ã€€ã€€","ã€€ã€€ç®€ä»‹ï¼š")
t = java.getStringList("#y-playList@span@text")
r = java.getStringList("#y-playList@small@text")
v = book.getVariable("custom") !="" ? book.getVariable("custom") : "0"
if(v > t.length || v < 0) { v = Math.floor(Math.random() * n.length); }
java.put("v",v)
n = "æ¥å£: "
for (o = 0; o < t.length; o++) {
  f = t[o] + "(å…± " + r[o] + " é›†)" + "ï¼Œ"
  n += f
}
intro = i + "\n" + n + "\næ³¨:å¡«å†™ä¹¦ç±å˜é‡ï¼Œåˆ·æ–°è¯¦æƒ…é¡µåˆ‡æ¢æ­£æ–‡æ¥å£,é»˜è®¤æ¥å£ä¸º0ï¼Œè‹¥å¡«å†™æ•°å­—è¶…å‡ºæ¥å£èŒƒå›´ï¼Œä¼šéšæœºè°ƒç”¨ã€‚\nå½“å‰æ¥å£: " + t[v] + "  å…± "+r[v]+" é›†"
cover = java.getString("class.module-item-pic.0@img@data-original") 
url = ""
JSON.stringify({
  name: name,
  author: author,
  kind: kind,
  lastchapter: lastchapter,

})

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
name = java.getString("h4@text")


author = java.getString("class.detail_imform_value.0@text") 


kind = java.getString("class.detail_imform_value.-1@text").replace("\/",",")


lastchapter = "" 


i = java.getString("class.detail_imform_desc_pre@html")


v = book.getVariable("custom") !="" ? book.getVariable("custom") : "0"


v = parseInt(v)


t = java.getStringList("#menu0@li@text")


Urls = java.getElements("#main0@div@ul"); 


if(v >= t.length || v < 0) { v = Math.floor(Math.random() * t.length); }


urls = Urls[v].select('li')


java.put("list", urls)


n = ""


for (o = 0; o < t.length; o++) {
  
  urls = Urls[o].select('li')

  f = "â¤åºå·ğŸ”º" + o + "ğŸ”»ã€" + t[o] + "ã€‘ \nè·¯çº¿ï¼š" + t[o] + " \næœ€æ–°ç« èŠ‚ï¼šç¬¬" + urls.length + "é›†\n"
  n += f
}


usage = "\nğŸ“Œä½¿ç”¨è¯´æ˜ï¼š æ ¹æ®åºå·è®¾ç½®ä¹¦ç±å˜é‡æ¥åˆ‡æ¢æ¥æº(é»˜è®¤0)ï¼Œè‹¥å¡«å†™æ•°å­—è¶…å‡ºæ¥å£èŒƒå›´ï¼Œä¼šéšæœºè°ƒç”¨\n"


currentSource = "ğŸ¯å½“å‰æºï¼šåºå·ğŸ”º" + v + "ğŸ”»ã€" + t[v] + "ã€‘ (é»˜è®¤)\n"


intro = i + "\n" + usage + currentSource + n


cover = java.getString("class.blockcontent.0@img@src")

url = ""


JSON.stringify({
  name: name,
  author: author,
  kind: kind,
  lastchapter: lastchapter,
  intro: intro,
  cover: cover,
  url: url
})

</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var JsDom = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup;
var Document = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
var Element = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Element;
            
var document = JsDom.parse(src);
            
// è·å–åŒ…å«<li>å…ƒç´ çš„<div>å…ƒç´ 
var divs = document.select('ul.list > div');

// å°†divsè½¬æ¢ä¸ºæ•°ç»„ä»¥ä¾¿æ’åº
var divArray = [];
for (var i = 0; i < divs.size(); i++) {
    divArray.push(divs.get(i));
}

// æŒ‰ç…§data-idå±æ€§å¯¹divArrayè¿›è¡Œæ’åº
divArray.sort(function(a, b) {
    var pageA = parseInt(a.attr('data-id'), 10);
    var pageB = parseInt(b.attr('data-id'), 10);
    return pageA - pageB;
});

var list = [];
// éå†æ’åºåçš„divArray
for (var i = 0; i < divArray.length; i++) {
    var div = divArray[i];
    var dataId = div.attr('data-id');
    // è·å–å½“å‰divä¸‹çš„æ‰€æœ‰<li>å…ƒç´ 
    var lis = div.select('li');
    for (var j = 0; j < lis.size(); j++) {
        var li = lis.get(j);
        var a = li.select('a').first();
        if (a != null) {
            list.push({
                text: a.text(),
                id: dataId, // ä½¿ç”¨data-idå±æ€§
                url: a.attr('href')
            });
        }
    }
}

java.log(JSON.stringify(list));
list;
</js>

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
var JsDom = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup;
var Document = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
var Element = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Element;

var document = JsDom.parse(src);

var scripts = document.select("script");

var result = []; // ç”¨äºå­˜å‚¨æœ€ç»ˆçš„ JSON æ•°æ®

for (var i = 0; i < scripts.size(); i++) {
    var script = scripts.get(i);
    var scriptContent = script.data();

    // åŒ¹é… self.__next_f.push çš„å†…å®¹
    var regex = /self\.__next_f\.push\((.*)\)/gs; // ä½¿ç”¨ /gs ä¿®é¥°ç¬¦åŒ¹é…å¤šè¡Œ
    var matches = [];
    var match;

    // éå†æ‰€æœ‰åŒ¹é…ç»“æœï¼Œä¿ç•™æœ€åä¸€ä¸ª
    while ((match = regex.exec(scriptContent)) !== null) {
        matches.push(match[1]);
    }

    // åªå¤„ç†æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªåŒ¹é…çš„å†…å®¹
    if (matches.length > 0) {
        var content = matches[matches.length - 1]; // è·å–æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªåŒ¹é…çš„å†…å®¹

        // é¢„å¤„ç†ï¼šå°†è‹±æ–‡é€—å·ï¼ˆ,ï¼‰æ›¿æ¢ä¸º ",\n"
        content = content.replace(/,/g, ",\n");

        // æ‰“å°é¢„å¤„ç†åçš„ç»“æœ
        //java.log(content);

        // åŒ¹é… "children":"(.*)" å’Œ "href":"(.*)" çš„æ­£åˆ™è¡¨è¾¾å¼
        var childrenRegex = /.*?"children.*?":.*?"(.*)\\"/g;
        var hrefRegex = /.*?"href.*?":.*?"(.*)\\"/g;
        var imgRegex = /.*?"src.*?":.*?"(.*)\\/g;

        var childrenMatches = [];
        var hrefMatches = [];
        var imgMatches = [];

        // æå–åŒ¹é…çš„å†…å®¹
        while ((match = childrenRegex.exec(content)) !== null) {
            // è¿‡æ»¤æ‰ä»¥ "$" å¼€å¤´çš„ children å†…å®¹
            if (!match[1].startsWith("$")) {
                childrenMatches.push(match[1]);
            }
        }
        while ((match = hrefRegex.exec(content)) !== null) {
            // åªåŒ¹é…ä»¥ "/comic.*" å¼€å¤´çš„ href å†…å®¹
            if (match[1].startsWith("/comic")) {
                hrefMatches.push(match[1]);
            }
        }
        while ((match = imgRegex.exec(content)) !== null) {
            // åªåŒ¹é…ä»¥ ".jpg" ç»“å°¾çš„ src å†…å®¹
            if (match[1].endsWith(".jpg")) {
                imgMatches.push(match[1]);
            }
        }

        // ä»ç¬¬2ä¸ª "children" å¼€å§‹å¤„ç†
        var startIdx = 2; // ç¬¬2ä¸ªå…ƒç´ çš„ç´¢å¼•ä¸º12
        if (childrenMatches.length > startIdx) {
            // æŒ‰æ¯5ä¸ªchildrenåˆ†ç»„
            for (var j = 0; j < hrefMatches.length; j++) {
                var group = {
                    name: childrenMatches[startIdx + j * 5] || "",
                    latestChapterTitle: childrenMatches[startIdx + j * 5 + 1] || "",
                    kind: childrenMatches.slice(startIdx + j * 5 + 2, startIdx + j * 5 + 5).join(", "),
                    url: hrefMatches[j] || "",
                    img: imgMatches[j] || "" // å¦‚æœæ²¡æœ‰å›¾ç‰‡ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨é»˜è®¤å€¼
                };
                result.push(group);
            }
        }
    }
}

// è¾“å‡º JSON æ¨¡æ¿
var jsonTemplate = JSON.stringify(result, null, 4);
java.log(jsonTemplate); // æˆ–è€…å…¶ä»–æ–¹å¼è¾“å‡º

</js>
$[*]

<js>
var ipaddr = baseUrl;
var path = "more";
var url = ipaddr + path;
let head = JSON.stringify({
  headers: {
 'User-Agent': "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/58.0.3029.110 Safari/537.36",
  'Accept-Encoding': "gzip, deflate, br, zstd",
  'sec-ch-ua-platform': "\"Android\"",

  'sec-ch-ua': "\"Android WebView\";v=\"131\", \"Chromium\";v=\"131\", \"Not_A Brand\";v=\"24\"",
  'sec-ch-ua-mobile': "?1",
  'Sec-Fetch-Site': "same-origin",
  'Sec-Fetch-Mode': "cors",
  'Sec-Fetch-Dest': "empty",
  'Referer': baseUrl,
  'Accept-Language': "zh-CN,zh;q=0.9,en-US;q=0.8,en;q=0.7,zh-TW;q=0.6,zh-HK;q=0.5"
  }
});
url + "," + head;

</js>
